venue.address_1: please contact revchristine@centersoflight.org to get the full address
venue.name: North Cambridge - Close to Alewife

item.description:
You are invited to gather around Mother Clare Watts, Mystical Christian Master in an informal and relaxed setting. Mother Clare will share her vision of the role of spirituality in this New Era and how we as human beings can be agents of peace. Take this opportunity to ask questions you always wanted to ask and receive answers that are enlightening and personal to you.

 

Mother Clare Watts is the Director of a mystical Christian community and Order called the Order of Christ/Sophia. She is an ordained Master Teacher and Priest, holding a Masters Degree in Counseling Psychology with post-graduate training in Jungian Analysis, and is a Certified Midwife. She is also the author of Giving Birth to God: A Woman's Path to Enlightenment  and  Mystical Roses of Peace.


Participation in all these events is by donation. All proceeds will help to cover the cost of running these events.

Suggested donation is $20 to $40, more or less depending on your resources.

Please park on the street and a parking permit will be provided at arrival.
item.name: What is the role of spirituality in this New Era with Mother Clare Watts
